mapper.insert: insert into wmember values (mem_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{country}, #{tel}, 'Y', null, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(m_id) as id from wmember where m_id = #{id}

select count(*) from wmember where m_id=#{m_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
